text: Kartika Tamara Liotard (26 June 1971 - 1 August 2020) was a Dutch politician, anti-pornography feminist, and civil servant. She was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 2004 to 2014. She was formerly a member of the Socialist Party. Liotard was vice-chair of the EULâ€“NGL group. She was born in Voorburg, South Holland, and studied law at Maastricht University. Liotard died on 1 August 2020, aged 49.Kartika Tamara Liotard ==References== ==Other websites== * European Parliament biography * Parlement.com biography Category:1971 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Anti-pornography activists Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Dutch jurists Category:Feminists Category:Independent politicians in the Netherlands Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:Politicians from South Holland Category:Socialist Party (Netherlands) politicians
title: Kartika Liotard
